title: Streets are for sharing
creator_credit: Greg Reading, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: The film seeks to raise people’s awareness of the range of options available among the competing demands for use of our streets. Residents, pedestrians, cyclists, motorists, transporters, all expect the roadway to meet their demands. The solutions are discussed. Narrated by Colin Taylor and Pat Bishop. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
